Class Npc

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.entities.Entity
de.oth.blocklib.entities.Npc
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
Animal, ClientAvatar, EntityGraphMarker, Human, Monster, Player, PursuitVillager, Villager

extends Entity
Author:
Florian Amthor, Christoph Weidner

  • Constructor Details

    • Npc

      public Npc​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f rotation, java.lang.String name)
      Constructor for a new NPC. The texturedModel needs to be already on the graphic memory.
      Parameters:
      position - Position of the Npc in world coordinates
      rotation - rotation of the Npc

    • update

      public abstract void update​(float deltaTime)
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Update function for entities Updates velocity based on forces, position based on velocity, the current rotation, adds gravity

      update in class Entity
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - time since last update
